mapper.select: SELECT sa.id AS sa_id, sav.id AS sav_id,sa.*,sav.* ,IF (ssav.sku_id, 1, 0) AS isChecked FROM pms_product_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value sav ON sa.product_id = sav.product_id AND sa.sale_attr_id = sav.sale_attr_id AND sa.product_id = #{productId} LEFT JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value ssav ON sav.id = ssav.sale_attr_value_id AND ssav.sku_id = #{skuId}
